remarks.format:
## Remarks The CodeParameterDeclarationExpressionCollection class provides a simple collection object that can be used to store a set of <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeParameterDeclarationExpression> objects.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to use the CodeParameterDeclarationExpressionCollection class methods. The example creates a new instance of the class and uses the methods to add statements to the collection, return their index, and add or remove attributes at a specific index point.
